overview:
## Discussion

The type of the value must match the property’s type (see [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/property_types] for a list of possible property types). If `property` is `nil` or if `value` is not of the correct type, this method raises an exception. If `property` is a multivalue list property, this method checks to see if the values in the multivalue list are the same type. If the multivalue list contains mixed types, the value will not be set successfully.

For a list of the available properties, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/Tasks/AccessingData.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001023] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/AddressBook.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000117i].

# setValue(_:forProperty:error:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the value of a given property for a record, returning error information.

## Declaration

```swift
func setValue(_ value: Any!, forProperty property: String!, error: ()) throws
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The value to set for `property`.
- **property**: The property whose value will be set.
- **error**: A pointer to an error object that is set to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] instance if an error occurs.

## Discussion

The type of the value must match the property’s type (see [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/property_types] for a list of possible property types). If `property` is `nil` or if `value` is not of the correct type, this method raises an exception. If `property` is a multivalue list property, this method checks to see if the values in the multivalue list are the same type. If the multivalue list contains mixed types, the value will not be set successfully.

For a list of the available properties, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/Tasks/AccessingData.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001023] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/AddressBook.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000117i].



## Retrieving and Setting Values

- **removeValue(forProperty:)**: Removes the value for a given property.
- **setValue(_:forProperty:)**: Sets the value of a given property for a record.
- **value(forProperty:)**: Returns the value of a given property for a record.
